attributes.action: A full government investigation & enquiry into the mass grooming scandal.
attributes.additional_details: To seek justice for those who have been made victims of sexual rape & misconduct by the justice system.
attributes.background: I want a full Enquiry into how much the government, local council and the local authorities had involvement in covering up the grooming scandals for the last 20 years.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
